title: Kanye West Throws Shade At Kim Kardashian's Ex-Husband Kris Humphries
text:
Related:

Kanye West Gets Love From Donald Trump Jr. For New Album 'Jesus Is King'

Fans Feel the Holy Spirit After Kanye Finally Drops 'Jesus Is King'

Kanye West Explains Why There's No 'Jesus Is King' Yet

Kim & Kanye Make Rare Red Carpet Appearance After He Fails To Release Album

Kanye West Banned His Team From Having Premarital Sex While Recording 'Jesus Is King'

Carpool Karaoke At The Next Level

Kanye West is never one to do things like everyone else, as is evident in his stop on James Corden's Carpool Karaoke. Or rather, Airpool Karaoke. Yes, Kanye isn't going to take a car like some normie. It's planes for him and Corden.

Shading Kim's Ex

View photos

While they were recording The Late Late Show segment, Kanye West explained that initially he thought that it would be "uncool" to get married, to which Corden replied, "No one ever thought it’d be uncool to marry Kim Kardashian. Everyone thought it’d be cool to marry Kim Kardashian."

Kanye, of course, couldn't resist throwing a little shade, so he laughed and replied "Well, not Kris Humphries."

Humphries and Kardashian had a lavish $10 million televised wedding and were only married for 72 days.

Praising Their Marriage

View photos

Kanye continued, praising his marriage to Kim. He claimed that "it’s more than cool. It’s more than cool as hell or something. It’s heavenly, it’s great, it’s magnificent."

Singing A Different Tune

Kanye was singing a different tune a few weeks ago when footage from Keeping Up With The Kardashians revealed that the rapper who recently has undergone a religious conversion was not a fan of Kim's 2019 Met Gala look. He claimed that her dressing sexy "hurt his soul."

"I went through this transition where being a rapper, looking at all these girls and looking at my wife, like, ‘Oh my girl needs to be just like the other girls showing their body off.' I didn’t realize that that was affecting my soul and my spirit as someone who is married and the father of now … about to be four kids. A corset is a form of underwear. It’s hot, for who though?"

Kim countered those comments saying "You built me up to be this sexy person and confidence and all this, and just because you’re on a journey and transformation doesn’t mean I’m in the same spot with you."

Kanye was visibly annoyed by the whole interaction.
description: The rapper also praised his "heavenly" married on 'Airpool Karaoke."
